about.title: About MorseCode
about.intro: Learn about the vision behind MorseCode and how we help learners, hobbyists, and professionals connect through rhythmic communication.

body.p1: MorseCode is your go-to destination for discovering, practicing, and perfecting Morse code. We design intuitive tools that make it easy to translate messages, explore reference material, and build speed through playful practice sessions.
body.p2: We believe that the legacy of Morse communication deserves a modern home. Whether you are decoding your first dots and dashes or polishing contest-ready skills, the platform adapts to your pace with clear guidance and smart feedback loops.
body.p3: Our roadmap includes collaborative community events, real-time exercises, and integrations with hardware devices so you can connect with Morse enthusiasts worldwide.

offerings.title: What We Offer
items: Instant translator for text-to-Morse and Morse-to-text conversions.
Comprehensive reference charts covering letters, numbers, and prosigns.
Interactive lessons, drills, and challenge modes designed for every level.
Fun signal demos, flashlight exercises, and puzzle-driven minigames.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Learn how MorseCode handles analytics data, cookies, and user rights across our experiences.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.body: MorseCode respects your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard information when you interact with the platform.

information.title: 2. Information We Collect
information.body: We gather non-personal analytics data such as browser type, approximate location, and usage patterns. Personal information is only collected if you deliberately share it with us, such as when submitting feedback.

cookies.title: 3. Cookies
cookies.body: Cookies help us remember preferences, enhance accessibility, and understand how features are used. You can disable cookies through your browser, though some functionality may be limited.

usage.title: 4. Data Usage
usage.body: Aggregated data guides product improvements, performance monitoring, and reliability efforts. We do not sell or rent your information.

thirdParty.title: 5. Third-Party Services
thirdParty.body: We may integrate privacy-friendly analytics providers. These partners process limited, anonymized data solely to deliver insights about feature usage.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.body: You may request access to, correction of, or deletion of any personal information you have shared with us. Contact the team and we will respond promptly.

updates.title: 7. Policy Updates
updates.body: We may revise this policy as the platform evolves. The latest version will always be available on this page with an updated effective date.

contact.title: Questions?
contact.body: If you have questions about this policy or wish to exercise your privacy rights, contact us at {email}.
